turkish: şikayet etmek (to express unhappiness about something)
example_en: Air conditioner in the hotel room didn't work so I complained about it.

turkish: birisine bir şeyi anlatmak, bir düşünceni paylaşmak (tell)
example_en: He is a very good person. You can share your secrets with him.
If you want to have lots of friends, you need to take part in social activities.
He is not here. Maybe he is taking a nap.
Take a shower after school each day. You will feel much better.

example_en: I will take care of my sick son.
